resources.string:
Self-massage can help relieve tension and promote relaxation. Learn simple techniques to practice at home.

Examples:
• Neck and shoulder massage
• Hand and wrist massage
• Foot massage
• Scalp massage

Benefits:
• Reduces muscle tension
• Increases circulation
• Improves flexibility
• Enhances relaxation

Tips:
• Use a comfortable amount of pressure
• Massage in a calm environment
• Use oils or lotions for smoother strokes
• Breathe deeply and relax
